resources.string: Dearest Amanda, I never knew how joyous life could be until I saw your face. My heart leaps like a hummingbird in flight every time I see you. This is something I have never felt before, and it is you that inspires it. When I think about you and our rich conversations, I feel a warmness inside. I cannot hide my smiles, even when we are apart. This connection is special, amazing, and I dare say, destiny. Many have asked what happened to create this new and better me. I tell them, without hesitation, it is you.
